title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Andrew Wommack Ministries (Toronto, ON) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: durée d'embauche 2 ans a 3 ans dans le cadre de missionnaire evangelistes.  J étais formé dans ce domaine pendant 3anset j étais certifié par diplôme. Donc je pris de vouloir postuler.
Interview Questions: quels les documents pour ce domaine ?

title: Phone Center Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Andrew Wommack Ministries (Colorado Springs, CO) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was asked about my heart for the ministry and desire to serve people.  They wanted to know basically how much familiarity I had with the ministry and if I would really support it.
Interview Questions: If I was familiar with the teachings from Andrew Wommack.
